synopsis.text: Its a tale of Renton Thurston, a 14-year-old residing in a quiet town of Bellforest with his mechanic grandfather. Renton's life takes an unexpected turn when a mech called Nirvash typeZERO crash-lands into his garage, accompanied by a young girl named Eureka, who seeks help for its repair. Eureka is a member of the daring mercenary group, Gekkostate, which Renton has always aspired to join. As the military gets involved, Renton's mundane life quickly transforms into an exhilarating adventure as he co-pilots the Nirvash alongside Eureka. Living under the shadow of his late father's heroic legacy and his grandfather's expectations to become a mechanic, Renton must navigate his newfound journey with Gekkostate, discovering that even dreams have their own challenges.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
